Introduction

Park Siyoung is a South Korean singer under DSP Media. He is a member of the boy group MIRAE.

On October 25, 2018, Park Si Young was introduced as a contestant of Under Nineteen with his moving poster. The poster revealed that he was a part of the performance team. He was part of the top 19, but was eliminated in the final episode.

He debuted as a member of MIRAE on March 17, 2021 with the mini album Killa.
